description: Travel intelligence knowledge base for smart task generation and agentic operations

MCO.name: Orlando International Airport
insider_tips: Order Uber from Level 2 (arrivals) to avoid surge pricing from Level 1
Mears Connect offers shared shuttle to Disney resorts at $16pp
Rental car counters are off-site, add 20min for shuttle wait

ORD.name: O'Hare International Airport
insider_tips: Blue Line train to downtown is $5 and often faster than Uber
Terminal 5 international has longest security waits, arrive 90min early
TSA PreCheck lines can be 5min vs 45min standard

MDW.name: Chicago Midway Airport
insider_tips: Orange Line train to downtown is $5
Smaller airport, security usually 15-20min
Southwest hub - free checked bags (2 per passenger)
No assigned seats - check in exactly 24h before for best boarding position
A1-15 boards first, consider Early Bird Check-In ($15-25) for better seats
Free checked bags (2 per person) - rare among US carriers
No change fees - flexible rebooking
Download Southwest app for mobile boarding pass
Fly Delta app required for mobile boarding
SkyMiles members get free seat selection 24h before
Comfort+ upgrade often available day-of for $50-100
United app required for mobile boarding
Basic Economy has last boarding group
Economy Plus seats have 4+ inches extra legroom

required_apps.name: My Disney Experience
required_apps.setup_deadline: 7 days before arrival for resort guests (LL booking)
required_apps.insider_tip: Link tickets and hotel reservation ASAP to unlock 7-day advance LL booking

advance_bookings.insider_tip: Buy at park opening, prices increase later in day. Prioritize for Magic Kingdom and Hollywood Studios (longest waits)
Book immediately at 7am, popular rides sell out by 9am

transportation.insider_tip: Uber between parks saves 30-60min vs Disney buses

required_apps.name: Universal Orlando App
required_apps.purpose: Express Pass, mobile food ordering, wait times
required_apps.insider_tip: Express Pass included free with onsite hotel stays (Portofino, Hard Rock, Royal Pacific)

disney_resorts.extended_evening: 2 hours after close (select parks, select nights)
insider_tips: Book dining reservations 60 days advance (vs 30 for off-site)
Free shuttle to all parks and Disney Springs
Mobile check-in available (skip front desk)

four_seasons_orlando.name: Four Seasons Resort Orlando at Walt Disney World
insider_tips: Request room with Magic Kingdom fireworks view (Tower rooms)
Complimentary shuttle to Disney parks (advance reservation required)
Ravello restaurant has character breakfast Thursdays
Spa is adults-only, book treatments when booking room for best availability

walt_disney_world_dolphin.name: Walt Disney World Dolphin
insider_tips: Walkable to EPCOT (10min) and Hollywood Studios (15min)
Not Disney-operated but gets Early Entry benefit
No MagicBands - use theme park tickets for room charging
Mobile check-in available via Bonvoy app

narcoossees.name: Narcoossee's
narcoossees.location: Grand Floridian Resort, Walt Disney World
insider_tips: Request window table for Magic Kingdom fireworks view (9:15 PM nightly)
Arrive 10-15min early for best fireworks seating
Dress code: business casual (no tank tops or flip-flops)
Prix fixe menu available for easier ordering
Call 24-48h ahead to discuss dietary restrictions with chef
narcoossees.reservation_window: 60 days for Disney resort guests, 30 days for others

the_edison.name: The Edison
insider_tips: Live entertainment nightly after 8 PM
Bar seating doesn't require reservations
Less crowded for lunch vs dinner

mickeys_very_merry_christmas_party.name: Mickey's Very Merry Christmas Party
insider_tips: Separate ticket required ($149-$199)
Enter park at 4 PM with party ticket (3 extra hours)
Free cookies and hot chocolate at stations
Special parade at 8:15 PM and 11 PM
Fireworks at 9:15 PM (less crowded than regular night)
Snow on Main Street USA during fireworks
Character meet & greets with no regular park crowds

disneys_animal_kingdom.name: Disney's Animal Kingdom Theme Park
insider_tips: Arrive at rope drop for Flight of Passage (2hr waits by 10am)
Animals most active in morning and evening
Kilimanjaro Safaris best first thing morning or last hour before close
Download Genie+ and book Flight of Passage at 7am day-of
Bring poncho - afternoon rain common

transportation_gaps.trigger: Flight arrival with no immediate hotel check-in method
transportation_gaps.action: Suggest specific transportation with timing, cost, insider tip
transportation_gaps.example: Book Uber from MCO to Four Seasons for 3:15 PM (flight lands 2:45 PM, allows 30min for bags). Use Level 2 pickup to avoid surge pricing. Estimated cost: $45-55.

app_requirements.action: List required app with specific deadline and reason
app_requirements.example: Download My Disney Experience app by Dec 5 (7 days before arrival) to book Lightning Lane reservations at 7am starting Dec 12. Link ticket #123456 and resort confirmation #ABC789 in app.

dietary_accommodations.action: Proactive dietary confirmation call with specific timing
dietary_accommodations.example: Call Narcoossee's at 407-939-3463 by Dec 10 (48h before reservation) to confirm gluten-free options. Request chef consultation for celiac accommodation.

advance_purchases.trigger: Theme park visit without advance purchases
advance_purchases.action: Recommend specific money/time-saving purchase with deadline
advance_purchases.example: Purchase Genie+ for Dec 12 Animal Kingdom visit at 7am on Dec 12. Priority: Book Flight of Passage first (sells out by 9am), then Expedition Everest. Expected cost: $25-30pp.

insider_timing.trigger: Popular activity or restaurant with viewing opportunity
insider_timing.example: Arrive at Narcoossee's by 8:45 PM (15min before 9pm reservation) to request window table for Magic Kingdom fireworks at 9:15 PM.
